trans-unit.source: Represents a class that manages the current instance of a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una classe che gestisce l'istanza corrente di un <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This class also provides the query interface over the current instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Questa classe fornisce anche l'interfaccia di query sull'istanza corrente di <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: By using an instance of this class, you can make various queries on the StateMachineWorkflowInstance.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di questa classe consente di rendere varie query su di StateMachineWorkflowInstance.

trans-unit.source: Typical queries that can be made are as follows: - Current state of the state machine.
trans-unit.target: Le query tipiche che è possono effettuare sono i seguenti: - corrente dello stato della macchina a stati.

trans-unit.source: - Possible transitions from the current state.
trans-unit.target: -Possibili transizioni dallo stato corrente.

trans-unit.source: - History of transitions for the state machine instance.
trans-unit.target: -Cronologia di transizioni per l'istanza macchina a stati.

trans-unit.source: - Enumeration of all the states in the state machine.
trans-unit.target: -Enumerazione di tutti gli stati della macchina a stati.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The current workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Il runtime del flusso di lavoro corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> that indicates the instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Guid>che indica l'istanza del <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: runtime is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: runtimeè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: or instanceId is an empty .
trans-unit.target: o instanceId è un oggetto vuoto .

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently executing <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene attualmente in esecuzione <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Corrente <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il nome dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Posts a message to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un messaggio di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow queue.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della coda del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The object to queue.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da accodare.

trans-unit.source: Posts a message to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un messaggio di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow queue.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della coda del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The object to queue.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da accodare.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"></xref> that allows the sender to be notified when the item is delivered.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"> </xref> che consente al mittente di ricevere una notifica quando l'elemento viene recapitato.

trans-unit.source: An object to be passed to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"></xref> methods.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto deve essere passato il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork"> </xref> metodi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Guid> that indicates the current instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref:System.Guid>che indica l'istanza corrente del <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> that indicates the current instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Guid>che indica l'istanza corrente del <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of state transitions that the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> can make.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di transizioni di stato che corrente <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> possibile apportare.

trans-unit.source: A collection of state transitions that the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> can make.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta dello stato di transizioni che corrente <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> possibile apportare.

trans-unit.source: Provides a transition to a specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> using the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una transizione a un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> utilizzando il nome del <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> to transition to.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> per la transizione.

trans-unit.source: targetStateName is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: targetStateNameè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The specified by targetStateName is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: Il specificato da targetStateName è un riferimento null ().

trans-unit.source: Provides a transition to a specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una transizione a un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> to transition to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> per la transizione.

trans-unit.source: targetState is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: targetStateè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of state activities that the state machine workflow instance has transitioned through.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di attività di stato che ha eseguito la transizione tramite l'istanza del flusso di lavoro macchina a stati.

trans-unit.source: This property only returns the state history if the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> is used.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce solo la cronologia di stato se il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>viene utilizzato.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: An `InvalidOperationException` occurs if the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> is not installed.
trans-unit.target: Un `InvalidOperationException` si verifica se il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>non è installato.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: If there is no state history for a newly created instance, state history is created without the instance being started.
trans-unit.target: Se è presente alcuna cronologia dello stato per un'istanza appena creata, la cronologia dello stato viene creata senza l'istanza avviata.

trans-unit.source: A collection of transitions that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> has made.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di transizioni che il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> stabilita.

trans-unit.source: Gets the latest definition of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la definizione di più recente di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property only returns a copy of the workflow definition and never the live instance tree.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce solo una copia della definizione del flusso di lavoro e mai l'albero dell'istanza attiva.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the activity tree that is returned by this property cannot be used to query for run-time values.
trans-unit.target: Albero delle attività che viene restituito da questa proprietà non può pertanto essere utilizzato per eseguire query per i valori in fase di esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: The latest definition of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La definizione di più recente di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the workflow has already completed, the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> cannot be retrieved, so the previous definition is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Se il flusso di lavoro è già stata completata, corrente <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref> non è possibile recuperare in modo che viene recuperata la definizione precedente.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> classes in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un elenco di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> classi in <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>

trans-unit.source: A list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> classes in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>.
trans-unit.target: Un elenco di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> classi in <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*> is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>è un riferimento null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> in Visual Basic).</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateMachineWorkflow*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Corrente <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"> </xref>.
